code: import React from'react';import{Typography,Box,Container,Link,Grid,CardMedia,Divider}from'@mui/material';import Navbar from'../Components/Navbar';import'./Blogs.css';import slaveryImage from'../Images/slavery.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blogs=()=>{const blogPosts=[{id:1,title:"Her Ties To Motherhood",summary:"The lives of enslaved women rewritten in the frame of motherhood.",link:"/Her-Power-Her-Past/blogs/post/1",imageUrl:slaveryImage}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{className:"home-container",children:blogPosts.map((post,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{className:"blog-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,alignItems:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",image:post.imageUrl,alt:post.title,className:"blog-media"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:8,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{href:post.link,color:"inherit",className:"blog-link",sx:{textDecoration:'none'},children:post.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:post.summary})]})]}),index!==blogPosts.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{})]},post.id))})})]});};export default Blogs;
